TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit HttpFileCollection extends System.Collections.Specialized.NameObjectCollectionBase
Public NotInheritable Class HttpFileCollection Inherits NameObjectCollectionBase

summary.span: 提供用戶端所上傳檔案的存取權，並進行組織。

span.span: Provides access to and organizes files uploaded by a client.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 用戶端檔案的編碼和傳輸中使用多重 MIME 格式的 HTTP 內容主體`Content-Type`標頭`multipart/form-data`。Clients encode files and transmit them in the content body using multipart MIME format with an HTTP `Content-Type` header of `multipart/form-data`. ASP.NET 會編碼的檔案內容的主體從擷取的個別成員至。ASP.NET extracts the encoded file(s) from the content body into individual members of an . 方法和屬性類別提供的存取權的內容與每個檔案的屬性。Methods and properties of the class provide access to the contents and properties of each file. ## Examples 下列範例示範如何存取從傳回的集合屬性物件。The following example demonstrates how to access the collection returned from the property of the object. 由兩個填入集合在網頁上的控制項。The collection is populated by two controls on the Web page. 檔案集合中的項目會顯示在控制項。Items in the file collection are displayed in a control. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.HttpFileCollection1#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.HttpFileCollection1/cs/HttpFileCollectionCS.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.HttpFileCollection1#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.HttpFileCollection1/vb/HttpFileCollectionVB.aspx#1)]

Public ReadOnly Property AllKeys As String()
public: property cli::array <System::String ^> ^ AllKeys { cli::array <System::String ^> ^ get(); };

summary.span: 取得字串陣列，包含檔案集合中所有成員的索引鍵 (名稱)。

span.span: Gets a string array containing the keys (names) of all members in the file collection.
An array of file names.

remarks.format: ## Examples 下列範例會載入從用戶端傳輸到字串陣列的名稱。The following example loads the names transmitted from a client into a string array. [!code-csharp[Classic HttpFileCollection.AllKeys Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic HttpFileCollection.AllKeys Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic HttpFileCollection.AllKeys Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic HttpFileCollection.AllKeys Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

summary.span: 將檔案集合成員複製到以指定陣列索引起始的 。

span.span: Copies members of the file collection to an beginning at the specified index of the array.

remarks.format: ## Examples 下列範例會將整個檔案集合複製到新物件。The following example copies the entire file collection into a new object. [!code-csharp[Classic HttpFileCollection.CopyTo Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic HttpFileCollection.CopyTo Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic HttpFileCollection.CopyTo Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic HttpFileCollection.CopyTo Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

summary.span: 從檔案集合中傳回個別 物件。

span.span: Returns an individual object from a file collection.

summary.span: 這個屬性被多載，以允許用名稱或數值索引來擷取 Cookie。

span.span: This property is overloaded to allow retrieval of objects by either name or numerical index.

An object.

remarks.format: ## Examples 下列範例會擷取第一個檔案物件 (索引 = 0) 從集合用戶端傳送和擷取的物件所代表的檔案名稱。The following example retrieves the first file object (index = 0) from the collection sent by the client and retrieves the name of the file represented by the object. [!code-csharp[Classic HttpFileCollection.Get1 Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic HttpFileCollection.Get1 Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic HttpFileCollection.Get1 Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic HttpFileCollection.Get1 Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

span.span: Returns the object with the specified name from the file collection.
An object.

remarks.format: ## Examples 下列範例會擷取用戶端傳送的集合中名為"CustInfo 」 的 「 檔案 」 物件，並擷取物件所代表的實際檔案名稱。The following example retrieves the file object named "CustInfo" from the collection sent by the client and retrieves the name of the actual file represented by the object. [!code-csharp[Classic HttpFileCollection.Get Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic HttpFileCollection.Get Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic HttpFileCollection.Get Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic HttpFileCollection.Get Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Examples 下列範例會循環檔案集合，並執行動作，如果找到 「 CustInfo"名稱的檔案集合成員。The following example loops through the file collection and takes action if a file collection member with the name "CustInfo" is found. [!code-csharp[Classic HttpFileCollection.GetKey Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic HttpFileCollection.GetKey Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic HttpFileCollection.GetKey Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic HttpFileCollection.GetKey Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

span.span: The name to match.

summary.span: 傳回符合指定名稱的所有檔案。

span.span: Returns all files that match the specified name.
The collection of files.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法會傳回新的集合執行個體每次呼叫時。This method returns a new collection instance each time it is called. 這個方法應該呼叫每個名稱，每個要求的一次。This method should be called once per name per request.

summary.span: 從集合中取得指定的 物件。
